title: Ban appeal
body:
Hello Riot, I would like to appeal a ban ( 14 day-suspension, iGN : Ÿašùo ) i got banned the same day i was being toxic. During my leash as J4 annie specifically waited for me to get the blue buff low and stole it. when she did that i gave bot kill a free kill by flashing in.. but after that she stole blue buff that i was going to give ahri, when i was level 9 i started saying "germans should die" (cause annie was german i think cause of her name was Ludënhorf) but i completely understand why i was banned for 14 days but i was just joking around overall i had a good time during playing league of legends. So please Riot can you please forgive me for the actions i have decided to do and un-ban me. PS : We won the game

Yours Sincerely - Ÿašùo

replies.body:
Hey summoner,

Since it is an account specific inquiry and we can't really help you out on the boards. If you want to appeal your case, you should send in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to Riot. 
From now its basically a waiting game.

Here are some guidelines for submitting a support ticket that will ensure the smoothest and fastest response possible:

> Please create a max of 1 ticket about this issue, and do not try to add any information afterwards/submit multiple as it will bump it to the back of the queue. It can take up to 7 business days for them to get back to you (although majority of tickets are answered within 48 hours), so be patient

Thanks Yaiamone, but could you simplify this? :)

- Ÿašùo

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Go to the link > I have a question about League of Legends/Riot Games > Log in if you haven't already > follow the prompts.

Only do this once. You will receive an email with their response.
personally if you said those things you're lucky you only got a 14 day ban.. joke or not..

Hello riot. I would like to appeal from a permanent  ban. I know I was been rude and toxic in some games. When you get trolls in game its annoying. While you have people who feed because they didn't get their lane or people who don't like playing support and or people who feed because they didn't get a kill or a red/blue buff. Or people who jg with no smite while your in game just to troll. I know I was toxic in them games. I really hope you can unban my account doomshine

Don't troll and don't say things like that. Even if someone does something you do not like, don't stoop down on their level doing something of a similar degree. You're even lucky to be able to keep your account after that.
Thank you for your appeal we will get back to you in 14 days

i have played with Yasuo before ( person that got banned ) and he's a very thoughtful person he helped me rank up form lvl 3 to lvl 14 and i really appreciate it from him and i know he can be bad sometimes but i believe he deserves a second chance. i believe you can get unbanned yasuo :) .

Arigato Riot goodbye.
